io.sphere.sdk.search

Class TypeSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.search.TypeSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the data to transform.

    public class TypeSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializer to transform certain types into SPHERE format.
